constantValues: An area to which funds may be allocated, including a GL-relevant accounting code.  Designations are the way a donor instructs an organization about how their donation should be spent or earmarked.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.
